MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located an underground cable fault on Clouden Road and we now expect your supply to be restored by 6pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.15pm on Thursday 18th February 2021.
